def attributes

Also aliased as: to_hash
key_filter() click to toggle source 
# File lib/support/attributes.rb, line 48
def key_filter
  @key_filter ||= Hash.new { |hash, key| hash[key] = key.to_s }
end
merge(other) click to toggle source 
# File lib/support/attributes.rb, line 30
def merge(other)
  return self if other.nil?
  other = JSON.parse(other) if other.is_a?(String) && other =~ /^\s*\{/
  
  other.to_hash.each_pair { |k,v| self[k] = v }
  self
end
Also aliased as: merge!
merge!(other) click to toggle source
Alias for: merge
reverse_merge(other) click to toggle source 
# File lib/support/attributes.rb, line 40
def reverse_merge(other)
  other.merge!(self)
end
Also aliased as: reverse_merge!

# File lib/support/attributes.rb, line 52
def value_filter
  @value_filter ||= Hash.new { |hash, key| hash[key] = key }
end
